text: Got anything that'll make blocking work better? I still get hurt even when blocking a hit. Total rip off!
I know just what you ladies need. A proper counter attack!
Press the block button just before an enemy strikes you to perform a counter.
With this, you wont take any damage, and you get a free hit off on any surrounding enemies.
As they say, the best defense is a good offense.
I think you got that backwards.
